scripts.deploy:dev:ci: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.development npx --node-options "-r dotenv/config" gatsby-plugin-s3 deploy --yes && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E25K6G2FOUH28O --paths "/*" --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:dev: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.development npx --node-options "-r dotenv/config" gatsby-plugin-s3 deploy && aws --profile=flo-website cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E25K6G2FOUH28O --paths "/*"
scripts.deploy:prod: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.production npx --node-options "-r dotenv/config" gatsby-plugin-s3 deploy && aws --profile=flo-website cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id __ID__ --paths "/*"
